english.segment1: On the back of a string of rough luck. Get a look at me now. Get a look at me now
english.segment2: Did you notice I already gave up?. Could you say it somehow?. Could you say it somehow?
english.segment3: I give what I can't take. Like an unmanned army. So if my back should break. Just pretend you never met me
english.segment4: If I'm happy, there's a good chance. I'm lying through my teeth. 'Cause without you it's doubtful
english.segment5: And it would take a miracle I know. To set this straight. And give back the hours that I stole. 'Cause without you it's doubtful
english.segment6: You couldn't wait for me to turn it around. Wasted half of your life, such a very long time. It seems I'm only good at letting you down. By the look in your eyes, by the look in your eyes
english.segment7: I give what I can't take. Like an unmanned army. So if my back should break. Just pretend you never met me
english.segment8: If I'm happy, there's a good chance. I'm lying through my teeth. 'Cause without you it's doubtful
english.segment9: And it would take a miracle I know. To set this straight. And give back the hours that I stole. 'Cause without you it's doubtful
english.segment10: If I'm happy, there's a good chance. I'm lying through my teeth. 'Cause without you it's doubtful
english.segment11: And it would take a miracle I know. To set this straight. And give back the hours that I stole. 'Cause without you it's doubtful
english.segment12: On the back of a string of rough luck. Get a look at me now. Get a look at me now.
